MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH39 postcode area of North Berwick. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:15pm following reports of a grounded overhead line and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:44pm on  Monday, 18 January 2021
